description:
This talk is about paring and it is not about why you should pair. It is about how to pair effectively when someone is not sat right next to you.

Shot by Just Shoot Me Digital - http://www.jsmdigital.co.za/
Music is Coma's U Dub by Nokom electro - http://www.jamendo.com/en/track/39238/coma-s-u-dub

title: Ping Ping or: How I learned to stop worrying and love remote paring - Ben Janeke
